It can be fun, or, it can be horrible.

I would reccomend you decide befiore you begin to play if you're going in to have a casual and fun time or if you're going to be a part of the competative scene. I say this because there seem to be two very different schools of thought at work inside the two camps.

Once you've decided on your goals as a player please be advised that the goals of those you encounter in matchmaking may not and likely will not be the same as your own. As a killer I have often encountered suvivors who think you're sole job as a killer is to give them a win. There even seem to be one or more unspoken rules within the competative community such as the last survivor should be allowed to win, by default. Weird, I know, but these are the things that have been claimed in chat and rarely in a polite manner. As a survivor I have encountered killers who seemed to take delight in allowing survivors to farm point as opposed to going for quick kills, while not intended these matches have at times been fun and resulted in some interesting interactions. On the other hand you will also likely enocounter killers who abandon the idea of patrolling the hooks to instead simply camp them individually. "Face Camping" can be overcome IF your team is willing to rush a hook in order to save someone, chances are though the risk will not be seen as worth it and if you are saved you weakened state won't leave you with much of a chance.

Countless other reviews here will talk to the point of systemic issues with matchmaking and P2P connections, and yes, those issues exist. Do they make the game unplayable? No, not in MY experience. However, the issues can make the game extremely frustrating.

All in all if you're looking for a game to raise your heart beat a little, give it a go. Just don't expect to walk away from your time spent playing having made new friends or to have felt the warm and fuzzies from engaging team dynamics.

Absolutely love this game. I was skeptical at first but my brother in law told me this game was fun. So as soon as i saw it on sale in steam, I picked it up. The next day, I decided to buy a controller and then put 20 hours of gaming into it the 2 days following. I also went and bought all the DLC's since they were on sale too. I really love this game!
they rEALLLY NEED TO FIX BEING A KILLER I SHOULD SWING AND THEN LOSE THEM ON MY SCREEN

This is one of the most fun games I have ever played. You get to stalk your friends with Myers, make them go insane and scream at your fake doctor image and hear then walk over that trap you apperently put on the ground. Then your friends wants revenge when they get to play as the killer.

Now playing against players that aren't your friends is also fun. I don't really care if they call me a camper I mean I'am a killer after all and they keep trying to go down the basement all the time when I know they're around. The doctor is so far my personal favourite killer. I also really like that you feel like a legit threat to the survivors as they can only do little to defend themselves, it was like I lived as the killer. Just watching them run while sending some electric shocks at them so they can scream for me.

Playing as a survivor is creepy and just send chills down your spine all the time. Camping killer doesn't really bother me since I'm just here for the crazy ride. I like the wraith and the witch for the crazy jumpscares they give you and also that feeling when you turn around to see Myers watching you is just terrifying. 

This is one of the best games to get scared with your friends/scare your friends. I'll give this 10/10 just because I'm feeling happy today.
Good Game !! 10/10

DBD Jest jedną z tych gier które bardzo mi przypadły do gustu.Dowiedziałem sie o niej oglądając na YT m.i.n Plage,Bladiego i Maxplaiera. Z początku nie radziłem sobie zabardzo z grą,było mi poprostu ciężko,zwałszcza że mialem popsute głośniki a słuch jest jednym z ważniejszych czynników w grze.Gra ma bardzo trudną do ogarnięcia mechanikie i by nauczyć sie wszystkiego trzeba poświęć tak mniejwięcej 70 godzin. Ja na obecną chwile mam 30 godzin rozegarnych w grze i nie zaszedłem zbyt daleko.Jest to gra skradankowa i raczej dla miłośników chasou nie polecałbym tej gry.A teraz przejdźmy do plusów i minusów

Plusy:
+Rozbudowania mechanikia rozgrywki - trzeba używać słuchu wzroku i nie panikować
+Zbalansowani zabójcy - każdy zabójca jest dobry,tylko trzeba umieć nim grać
+Rozbudowany system umiejetnosci - w drzewku umiejetnosci (bloodweb) co 1 poziom dostajemu umiejętność raz gorszą raz lepsza mają one 3 poziomy od common-very rare,uncommon-ultra rare rare -ultra rare i tak dalej im rzadsza umiejętność tym mniej poziomów ma umiejętnośc oprócz nich w drzewku znajdują się różne przedmioty i dodatki do nich
każdy przedmiot jest użyteczny na 1 lub kilka sposóbów.
+Unikalność Postaci - każda postać posiada unikalną zdolność na 15,25,50 poziomie ktory jest maksymalnym poziomem który możemy uzyskać.
+system quick time events - ten system jest bardzo poszewchny w grach ale sposób w jaki jest on tu używany jest niecodzienny

A teraz najgorsza część recenzji czyli Minusy:

Ogólnie nie ma co tu pisać chodzi tu głownie o bugi występujące w grze jak bugowanie sie tablicy pod koniec meczu,modeli postaci i czasami wywala gre. Drugim minusem jest dziwne cofanie postaci lub nieregularne lagi które pchają postac w randomowym kierunku (Zdaża sie tylko w przypadku grania survivorem)

Na koniec chce dodać że rzadko kiedy zdaża sie wyciągać taki potencjał z gry niezależnego studia.

I think that Dead By Daylight is a great game for its price, you get to play with friends against a killer, or kill your friends. you can also play ranked with random people. its an awesome game and if you like Friday the 13th (another game you should check out if you love this) then you will like this too! :)

I HATE IT SO MUCH DON'T PLAY IT. ONLY BEARABLE TO PLAY WHEN DRUNK WITH FRIENDS. When it first came out in 2016 yes very pog. Nowadays it's just dogshit. Nothing new about gameplay for the last couple of years apart from shiny cosmetics, new killers, and perks. That's all. No crazy changes and nothing new to do. It's just not enjoyable anymore. Maybe as a new player, it could be a fun experience but after playing since 2017? Nope. Will I still play? Maybe, but probably only two games while drunk.

游戏很好玩，很刺激，差评是给稀烂的新手引导的，本来我以为一个游戏对新手不友好是上手难度和玩家问题，然而玩了这个我才发现厂家也有问题，第一次进游戏没有任何新手教学，设置里面的教学选项只有英文，或与有人会说，没个选项都会显示，但是新手会被很多细节坑害，比如发电机和回血的QTE，其实是有一段声效作为前置的，我一开始完全忽略，而QTE实在太快基本上出现就会爆米花，第一次发现这个声效甚至以为鬼来了，直接逃跑导致爆米花，而知道这个声效规则后，QTE就变得简单很很多，我现在基本上不会爆米花了。现在问题就是不会溜怪，算是不熟悉地图，而地图也有很多陷阱，经常发现2个物体中间有一片空隙，你以为能传过去，然而会被空气墙垱死，玩家还是可以的，没有遇到把我吊着还不停砍我的我i的情况，有些鬼还会故意放我走

Best Horror Game!

Got this game during steam sales and it's pretty fun! For those who said killer is OP or whatever that is, killer is not OP. I mainly played as survivor and escaped many times with random people in the lobby. You just need have teamwork and be mindful of your surroundings before you fix the machine or run. Personally I hate Nurse and the "Ding Dong' killer very much. But still, totally recommended to buy!
